channel.title: How to start Matrix Server?
channel.description:
When i start run.bat i got this error:
http://www.part.lt/img/5c6a5acf101df9f07f6fa7a22bd8d735679.png
And there isn't is compiler.bat can anyone say to me compiler.bat code? And how to fix run error. My pc is: intel core 2duo 4gb ram 2.2ghz

item.title: How to start Matrix Server?
item.dc:creator: @thakillah thakillah
item.description:
@thakillah wrote:

Compiler: @echo off echo Compiling... "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_02\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp lib/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/*.java @echo Finished. pause

Run.bat @echo off @title RUN MATRIX java -XX:-OmitStackTraceInFastThrow -Xms512m -Xmx512m -cp bin;data/libs/netty-3.5.2.Final.jar;data/libs/FileStore.jar com.rs.Launcher false false true pause

CHANGE THE jdk1.7.0_02 JDK VERSION TO YOU VERSION

Read full topic

item.title: How to start Matrix Server?
item.dc:creator: @alexis1 alexis1
item.description:
@alexis1 wrote:

[quote=“V 1 N C H, post:2, topic:465327”]1. Your link is to a forbidden webserver
2. Your computer specs don’t matter
3. Here’s my compiler

@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_05\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp lib/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/game/player/Player.java echo compiled Player folder "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_05\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp lib/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/Launcher.java echo compiled Server folder "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_05\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp lib/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/game/player/dialogues/*.java echo compiling Dialogues "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_05\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp lib/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/*.java echo compiled Main Server Folder "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_05\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp lib/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/game/player/content/*.java echo compiled Main Server Folder "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_05\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp lib/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/net/decoders/handlers/*.java echo Compiled all Successfully pause[/quote]

thats a terrible compiler

anyways im guessing you either dont have both subs for client and source on the same sub should both be on either 3 or 7

also im guessing you have not added the cache into your source>data>cache without that your source will not run

make sure that your run.bat is also set to the proper java x86 or just jre7

Read full topic

item.title: How to start Matrix Server?
item.dc:creator: @V_1_N_C_H V 1 N C H
item.description:
@V_1_N_C_H wrote:

  1. Your link is to a forbidden webserver
  2. Your computer specs don’t matter
  3. Here’s my compiler

@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_05\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp lib/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/game/player/Player.java echo compiled Player folder "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_05\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp lib/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/Launcher.java echo compiled Server folder "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_05\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp lib/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/game/player/dialogues/*.java echo compiling Dialogues "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_05\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp lib/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/*.java echo compiled Main Server Folder "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_05\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp lib/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/game/player/content/*.java echo compiled Main Server Folder "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_05\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp lib/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/net/decoders/handlers/*.java echo Compiled all Successfully pause
